title: Incentive for workers’ remittances increased to Rs.38
body_lines: As the national economy is desperate for foreign exchange inflows, the Cabinet of Ministers today announced their decision to increase the incentive offered for foreign remittances.
The incentive offered for foreign remittances entering the country via official baking channels has been increased to Rs. 38 from Rs. 10.
The incentive will be offered till April 2022.
